attributes.review: It took about 45 mins to download then when I opened it, it took even more time processing my information. Then when I tried to get seats, it kept glitching. It even kicked me out multiple times. I wasn’t able to hold seats because of this downgrading, disgusting, repugnant app you have on here. I’m so fuming I can barely type. This is unexplainable, do better apple.

attributes.review: I cannot believe what this app did to my phone. I opened it and all of a sudden my phone started glitching. Then my phone started blasting different songs such as gangnam style, which i found particularly odd since we know how trump feels about people who aren’t white. then every tv in my house started playing casablanca in italian subtitles. I didn’t even sync my phone to the tv, it just did it without asking. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS! ITS A DISGRACE TO THE NATION! SAD!
